description:
Adds color blindness correction/simulation filters to the quick settings menu.

A variety of filters are available for correcting or simulating color blindness. See the extension's homepage for more details. Please report issues there if you have any trouble; Codeberg will send the developer an email so they see your issue sooner!

The developer would be delighted to hear what you think of the Opponent Color Solver filter. It's their creation and they want to make is as useful as possible.

This extension was forked from GdH's Colorblind Filters extension. It has more filter options and a different user interface. It also fixes the screen recorder and multi-monitor bugs.
name: Colorblind Filters Advanced
